Name: Project Crypt
About the game: Project Crypt is an action-adventure horror game inspired by critically-acclaimed horror titles such as Cry of Fear. You play as a disturbed young individual trying to find a way out of a city filled with horrific enemies. Find out the truth of your past and make it out to safety alive! Project Crypt is a game built on GZDoom, featuring action-packed combat encounters and creepy atmospheric areas in a variety of different environments. This world is a hostile place, so you will have to be careful, with managing your ammo supply and constantly be on the lookout for your health. Photosensitivity warning: This video game contains scenes with flashing and flickering lights that may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Key Features: Extensive single-player campaign Multiple outcomes of the story depending on your actions in the game Moody soundtrack to enhance the atmosphere Robust inventory system to enhance the gameplay A new survival-horror experience Nostalgic visual style echoing back to the early 2000s
